system.description:
Trigger: This attack is used as a result of Seizing the Moment.
Effect: On hit, the target has a 20% chance of losing -1 DEF stage for 5 Activations. When used with the Trigger Condition, this attack's PP cost becomes 1, its Power doubles, and has a +20% chance of causing the target to lose -1 DEF stage for 5 Activations on hit.
